text: Colin Pearce Davey (29 June 1927 – 20 July 2013) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1927 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Western Australia Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Subiaco Football Club players
title: Col Davey
